Name: Stormbringer
Desc: Monsters that have experienced corrosion as the Fragmentum expanded. They now have a more nimble way of fighting after the source of their power mutated.\nStormbringers utilize the power of the wind to aid them in battle, enabling them to fire arrows more rapidly.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.
Deals minor Wind DMG to the target and units adjacent to the target, with a chance to inflict Wind Shear.
Enters the Charging state and locks on to all targets currently suffering Wind Shear. Cast Windfall Storm in the next action.
Deals Wind DMG to targets afflicted with Wind Shear. This ability fails if no one on the target team suffers Wind Shear.
Slightly increases ATK after attacking a target afflicted with Wind Shear. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.
Deals Wind DMG to targets afflicted with Wind Shear. This ability fails if no one on the target team suffers Wind Shear.
